TypeSignature.Value: public class Button : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class Button Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Button : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl

summary.span: 顯示網頁上的按鈕控制項。

span.span: Displays a push button control on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [按鈕回傳行為 」 和 「 伺服器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [用戶端指令碼處理 按鈕事件Handling Button Events in Client Script](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [按鈕控制項和驗證Button Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [資料控制項中的按鈕Buttons in Data Controls](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [資料繫結至控制項Binding Data to the Controls](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [使用具有 UpdatePanel 控制項的按鈕Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來建立網頁，可讓使用者張貼至伺服器 頁面上的按鈕。Use the control to create a push button on the Web page that lets users to post a page to the server. 控制觸發程序，您可以控制它們來回應回傳伺服端程式碼中的事件。The control triggers an event in server code that you can handle to respond to the postback. 它也可以引發事件，網頁回傳或可執行及取消送出的頁面之前，您可以處理的用戶端指令碼。It can also raise an event in client script that you can handle before the page is posted or that can run and then cancel submission of the page. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 包括各種類型的按鈕控制項，其中每個網頁以不同的方式出現。ASP.NET includes several kinds of button controls, each of which appears differently on Web pages. 它們是控制項，會轉譯成按鈕;控制項，會轉譯成連結; 和控制項，會轉譯成影像; 而控制項，可讓您建立具有作用點圖形使用者可以按一下。They are the control, which renders as a push button; the control, which renders as a link; and the control, which renders as an image; and the control, which lets you create a graphic that has hotspots that users can click. 根據預設，所有按鈕控制項送都出頁面時按下。By default, all button controls submit the page when clicked. 您也可以使用和伺服端程式碼中進行程式設計來建立在頁面上的按鈕控制項。You can also use the and controls to create buttons on the page that are programmable in server code. 如需 HTML 和 Web 伺服器控制項之間的差異詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84)。For details about the differences between HTML and Web server controls, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84). 根據預設，控制項是送出按鈕。By default, a control is a Submit button. 送出按鈕沒有命令名稱 (所指定屬性) 只是網頁回傳至伺服器的文章與按鈕相關聯。A Submit button does not have a command name (specified by the property) associated with the button and simply posts the Web page back to the server. 您可以提供的事件處理常式按一下 [提交] 按鈕時，執行事件，以程式設計方式控制的動作。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 在命令按鈕的命令名稱與按鈕相關聯，例如`Sort`，藉由設定屬性。A Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`, by setting the property. 這可讓您建立多個Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 您也可以使用屬性來提供其他資訊，才能執行這類命令的命令按鈕`Ascending`。You can also use the property with a command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`. 您可以提供的事件處理常式事件，以程式設計方式控制的動作執行的命令按鈕。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Command button is clicked. ## 按鈕回傳行為 」 和 「 伺服器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events 當使用者按一下任何 Web 伺服器控制項的按鈕時，網頁會傳送到伺服器。When a user clicks any Web server control button, the page is sent to the server. 這會導致處理網頁，並在伺服器端程式碼中引發任何暫止的事件。This causes the Web page to be processed and any pending events to be raised in server-based code. 所有頁面和控制處理都完成時，頁面呈現其本身的瀏覽器一次。When all page and control processing has finished, the page renders itself to the browser again. 按鈕可以引發自己事件或事件，您可以使用伺服器端程式碼處理。The buttons can raise their own events or event, which you can handle by using server-based code. 這是與不同事件在傳統的 HTML 頁面中，或在用戶端為基礎的 Web 應用程式，其中一個按鈕`onclick`使用 JavaScript 執行用戶端中處理事件。This is different than events in traditional HTML pages or in client-based Web applications, where a button's `onclick` event is handled by using JavaScript that runs in the client. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). 當使用者按一下按鈕控制項時，則會將頁面回傳至伺服器。When users click a button control, the page is posted back to the server. 根據預設，頁面回傳至本身，By default, the page is posted back to itself, 您可以設定將目前網頁到另一頁按鈕。You can configure buttons to post the current page to another page. 這可以是適用於建立多頁表單。This can be useful for creating multi-page forms. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For details, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). ## 用戶端指令碼處理 按鈕事件Handling Button Events in Client Script 伺服器事件，以及用戶端事件，可能會引發按鈕控制項。Button controls can raise both server events and client events. 伺服器事件之後會發生回傳，且您為網頁撰寫的伺服器端程式碼中處理。Server events occur after postback, and they are handled in the server-side code that you write for the page. 用戶端事件用戶端指令碼，通常 ECMAScript (JavaScript)，以進行處理，以及送出頁面之前引發。Client events are handled in client script, typically ECMAScript (JavaScript), and are raised before the page is submitted. 將用戶端事件加入至 ASP.NET 按鈕控制項，您可以執行工作，例如顯示確認對話方塊之前送出頁面上，且可能會取消提交。By adding client-side events to ASP.NET button controls, you can perform tasks such as displaying confirmation dialog boxes before submitting the page, and potentially cancel the submission. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[用戶端指令碼中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)和[如何： 回應在用戶端指令碼按鈕 Web 伺服器控制項事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b)。For details, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa) and [How to: Respond to Button Web Server Control Events in Client Script](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b). 您也可以也用來執行回傳 （而不是只需執行的 HTTP POST 作業） 的 用戶端指令碼控制項。You might also want the control to also use client script to perform the postback (instead of simply performing an HTTP POST operation). 這很有用，如果您想要以程式設計方式管理回傳，例如將它附加到頁面上的其他項目。This can be useful if you want to programmatically manipulate the postback, such as attaching it to other elements on the page. 您可以設定控制項的屬性`true`造成控制項使用用戶端指令碼基礎回傳。You can set the control's property to `true` to cause the control to use client-script based postback. ## 按鈕控制項和驗證Button Controls and Validation 如果某個頁面包含 ASP.NET 驗證控制項中，依預設，按一下按鈕控制項會導致執行其檢查驗證程式控制項。If a page contains ASP.NET validator controls, by default, clicking a button control causes the validator control to perform its check. 如果用戶端驗證已啟用的驗證程式控制項中，未送出頁面如果驗證檢查失敗。If client-side validation is enabled for a validator control, the page is not submitted if a validation check has failed. 下表描述按鈕控制項，可讓您更精確地控制驗證程序所支援的屬性。The following table describes the properties supported by button controls that enable you to control the validation process more precisely. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定是否按一下按鈕也會執行驗證檢查。Specifies whether clicking the button also performs a validation check. 將此屬性設定為`false`以防止驗證檢查。Set this property to `false` to prevent a validation check.| ||可讓您指定在按下按鈕時，要呼叫哪一個頁面上的驗證程式。Enables you to specify which validators on the page are called when the button is clicked. 如果不建立任何驗證群組，按一下按鈕就會呼叫所有頁面上的驗證。If no validation groups are established, a button click calls all of the validators that are on the page.| 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證 ASP.NET 網頁中的使用者輸入](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 資料控制項中的按鈕Buttons in Data Controls 按鈕 Web 伺服器控制項通常用在資料控制項，例如在， ，和清單控制項。Button Web server controls are often used in data controls, such as in the , , and list controls. 在這些情況下，您通常不回應直接按鈕 click 事件。In those cases, you typically do not respond directly to the button click event. 相反地，資料控制項中的按鈕會引發事件的特定資料控制項。Instead, a button in a data control raises an event that is specific to the data control. 例如，在控制項，可能會引發按鈕控制項的而非引發的事件控制項的事件。For example, in the control, a button might raise the control's event instead of raising the control's event. 因為資料繫結清單控制項可以包含有許多按鈕，您可以設定按鈕的屬性來指定要做為事件的一部分傳遞的值。Because data-bound list controls can contain many buttons, you can set the button's property to specify a value to pass as part of the event. 然後您就可以測試以查看哪一個按鈕已按下這個引數。You can then test for this argument to see which button was clicked. ## 資料繫結至控制項Binding Data to the Controls 您可以為了控制它們的屬性設定按鈕的 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料來源以動態方式。You can bind the button Web server controls to a data source in order to control their property settings dynamically. 例如，您可以設定按鈕的使用資料繫結的屬性。For example, you can set a button's property by using data binding. ## 使用具有 UpdatePanel 控制項的按鈕Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls 在局部網頁呈現可讓您能夠重新整理頁面上，不需回傳的部分。Partial-page rendering makes it possible to refresh portions of a page without a postback. 控制項可讓您將標示參與局部網頁呈現的網頁組件。 controls enable you to mark parts of the page that participate in partial-page rendering. 根據預設，在內部的控制項的行為控制，包括控制，是執行非同步回傳而非回傳。By default, the behavior of controls inside an control, including controls, is to perform an asynchronous postback instead of a postback. 這會重新整理的內容控制項的回傳的來源。This refreshes only the contents of the control from which the postback originates. 除了的案例是內部控制項控制項，您可以使用控制與控制項在下列案例：In addition to the scenario of a control that is inside an control, you can use controls with controls in the following scenarios: - 定義之外的控制項控制項作為該面板的控制項。Defining a control that is outside an control as an control for that panel. 按一下按鈕時，它會執行非同步回傳，並重新整理面板的內容。When the button is clicked, it performs an asynchronous postback and refreshes the contents of the panel. - 定義內部控制項控制項作為面板。Defining a control that is inside an control as a for the panel. 按一下按鈕時，即使它是在執行回傳控制項。When the button is clicked, it performs a postback even though it is inside an control. 如需有關局部網頁呈現，並使用控制項，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about partial-page rendering and using controls, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立提交張貼至伺服器的內容 Web 網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Submit control that posts the Web page content back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立命令排序清單的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Command control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫在自訂的伺服器控制項的方法，讓文字一律會以紅色顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control, so that the text always displays in red. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/CS/custombuttonaddattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomButtonAddAttributesToRender/VB/custombuttonaddattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 您應該設定屬性`false`當您使用回傳至其他頁面的屬性。You should set the property to `false` when you are using the property to post back to a different page. 當張貼至不同頁面時，您應該明確檢查驗證。You should explicitly check validation when posting back to a different page. 如需範例，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節屬性。For an example, see the Remarks section of the property. 這個屬性通常會設定為`false`如`reset`或`clear`按鈕，以避免在按下按鈕時執行驗證。This property is commonly set to `false` for a `reset` or `clear` button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以防止發生頁面驗證的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意，方法獨立啟動每個驗證控制項。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/CS/buttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/VB/buttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler Click;
.event class System.EventHandler Click
Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ Click;

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常使用於沒有命令名稱相關聯控制項 （例如，對於提交按鈕）。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件，以便在網站上顯示一則訊息頁面時按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a message on the Web page when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件時常用的命令名稱，例如`Sort`，相關聯控制項。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 這可讓您建立多個Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件，以排序清單時按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 這個範例會指定事件處理常式以宣告方式，使用屬性控制項。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定事件處理常式，並以程式設計方式將它加入至事件中`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandArgument { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandArgument
Public Property CommandArgument As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandArgument { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定選擇性 (Optional) 參數，與相關的 一起傳遞至 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .

value.span: 取得或設定選擇性 (Optional) 參數，與相關的 一起傳遞至 事件。

span.span: An optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定參數，可補充屬性。Use the property to specify a parameter that compliments the property. > [!NOTE] > 雖然您可以設定本身的屬性，它通常是僅使用時也設定屬性。Although you can set the property by itself, it is normally only used when the property is also set. 屬性補充屬性可讓您提供執行命令的其他資訊。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide additional information about the command to perform. 例如，如果您設定屬性`Sort`和屬性`Ascending`，您指定要以遞增順序排序的命令。For example, if you set the property to `Sort` and the property to `Ascending`, you specify a command to sort in ascending order. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以建立清單依遞增順序排序的控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list in ascending order. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandName { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandName
Public Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 控制項關聯的命令名稱，這個命令名稱將傳遞至 事件。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control that is passed to the event.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您有多個控制項會在網頁上，使用與每個相關聯的屬性，指定，或決定的命令名稱控制項。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with each control. 您可以設定屬性與任何字串，識別要執行的命令。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 接著，您可以透過程式設計方式決定的命令名稱控制，並執行適當的動作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 其他資訊的命令，例如`Ascending`，可能會利用指定屬性。Additional information about the command, such as `Ascending`, may be specified by using the property. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以建立排序清單的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetPostBackOptions () As PostBackOptions
protected: virtual System::Web::UI::PostBackOptions ^ GetPostBackOptions();

summary.span: 建立表示 控制項之回傳行為的 物件。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: ，表示 控制項的回傳行為。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，代表控制項的回傳行為。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 物件通常隨後會傳遞至方法，用來取得用戶端指令碼函式的參考，叫用時，會導致回傳至網頁伺服器。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法類別。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以覆寫衍生類別來修改回傳的選項按鈕控制項，或按一下按鈕時呼叫用戶端指令碼中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 確定呼叫基底類別的方法，使標準回傳選項所設定。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件通常使用於沒有命令名稱相關聯控制項 （例如，對於提交按鈕）。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式為了在網頁上顯示簡單訊息的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a simple message on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string OnClientClick { get; set; }
.property instance string OnClientClick
Public Overridable Property OnClientClick As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ OnClientClick { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當 控制項的 事件引發時執行的用戶端指令碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

value.span: 當 控制項的 事件引發時執行的用戶端指令碼。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定其他的用戶端指令碼時執行控制項的就會引發事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised. 您指定這個屬性會在轉譯的指令碼控制項的`OnClick`屬性除了控制項的預先定義的用戶端指令碼。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871). 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定其他的用戶端指令碼時執行按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/cs/button.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/vb/button.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCommand(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCommand (e As CommandEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnCommand(System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件時常用的命令名稱，例如`Sort`，相關聯控制項。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 這可讓您建立多個Web 上的控制項頁面上，並以程式設計方式判斷哪些按一下控制項時。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件，以排序清單時按一下控制項時。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 這個範例會指定事件處理常式以宣告方式，使用屬性控制項。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定事件處理常式，並以程式設計方式將它加入至事件中`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 判斷按鈕在用戶端上呈現之前是否已按下。

span.span: Determines whether the button has been clicked prior to rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂類別時，方法使用主要由控制項開發人員控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string PostBackUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當按下 控制項時，從目前的網頁要張貼到之目的地網頁的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 當按下 控制項時，從目前的網頁要張貼到之目的地網頁的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會使頁面回傳到本身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您執行 post 使用跨網頁控制項。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有正確指定的路徑會使用這個屬性。Only correctly specified paths work with this property. 例如，相對路徑 (Test/default.aspx)，絕對路徑 (https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx)和虛擬 (~ \Test\default.aspx) 正常運作。For example, relative paths (Test/default.aspx), absolute paths (https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx) and virtual (~\Test\default.aspx) work correctly. 格式不正確的路徑這類 「 / Test/default.aspx"或"\Test\default.aspx 」 無法運作。Incorrectly formed paths such as "/Test/default.aspx" or "\Test\default.aspx" do not work. 請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)如需有關建立正確路徑的討論。See [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd) for a discussion on creating correct paths. 設定屬性至網頁的 URL 時張貼按一下控制項時。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`會使得包含的網頁張貼到控制項`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果您未指定的值屬性頁面回傳至本身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當執行伺服器端驗證使用的控制項與跨網頁回傳時，您應該檢查頁面的屬性是`true`之前處理回傳。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 在跨網頁回傳，若要檢查頁面須。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the . 下列的 VB 程式碼會示範方式：The following VB code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 如需有關跨網頁公佈技術的詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來執行跨網頁回傳。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 當使用者按一下控制項，在網頁回傳至指定的目標頁面的文字方塊中輸入的值屬性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要執行此範例中，您也必須為這個程式碼範例的相同目錄中建立目標頁面的檔案。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目標頁面的程式碼提供一個範例中。The code for target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/button.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/button.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取從另一個頁面使用的已張貼值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此頁面取得公佈前一個分頁的並向使用者顯示的字串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果您嘗試直接執行這個程式碼範例，您就會發生錯誤，因為值`text`欄位就是`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 請改用此程式碼建立目標網頁，並將檔案放在與前一個範例的程式碼相同的目錄。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 檔案的名稱必須對應到指定的值前一個範例中的屬性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 當您執行先前的範例程式碼時，這個網頁會在頁面間張貼發生時自動執行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/button.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/button.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它永遠都會顯示下列自訂文字伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays text following a custom server control. summary.span: 回傳至伺服器時，便會引發 控制項的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會在內部使用控制項，它按一下時，引發事件，而且如果定義，事件。This event is used internally by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event, and if defined, a event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使它一定會引發中自訂事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always raises the event in a custom control. summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 控制項中的文字標題。

value.span: 顯示於 控制項中的文字標題。

span.span: The text caption displayed in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷要在顯示的標題控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display in the control. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定中顯示的標題控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSubmitBehavior { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseSubmitBehavior
Public Overridable Property UseSubmitBehavior As Boolean
public: virtual property bool UseSubmitBehavior { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項使用用戶端瀏覽器的送出機制或 ASP.NET 回傳機制。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

value.span: 如果控制項使用用戶端瀏覽器的送出機制則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制項使用的用戶端瀏覽器的提交機制或 ASP.NET 回傳機制。Use the property to specify whether a control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 根據預設值，這個屬性是`true`，因而導致控制項使用的瀏覽器送出的機制。By default the value of this property is `true`, causing the control to use the browser's submit mechanism. 如果您指定`false`，ASP.NET 網頁架構會將用戶端指令碼加入至頁面以表單張貼至伺服器。If you specify `false`, the ASP.NET page framework adds client-side script to the page to post the form to the server. 當屬性是`false`，控制項開發人員可以使用方法以傳回用戶端回傳事件。When the property is `false`, control developers can use the method to return the client postback event for the . 所傳回的字串方法包含用戶端函式呼叫的文字，而且可以插入到用戶端事件處理常式。The string returned by the method contains the text of the client-side function call and can be inserted into a client-side event handler. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的送出機制，控制使用回傳至伺服器時。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the submit mechanism that a control uses when it posts back to the server. 屬性設定為`false`，導致該按鈕可以使用 ASP.NET 回傳機制。The property is set to `false`, causing the button to use the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 如果您要檢視使用您的瀏覽器檢視原始碼命令所呈現頁面的原始程式碼，您會看到用戶端指令碼，已加入 ASP.NET 網頁架構以表單張貼至伺服器。If you view the source code for the rendered page using your browser's View Source command, you will see that client-side script has been added by the ASP.NET page framework to post the form to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/CS/button.usesubmitbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/VB/button.usesubmitbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when a control posts back to the server. 此頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的三個文字方塊和三個控制項，以確保該使用者不會讓文字方塊空白。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項中的前兩個文字方塊`PersonalInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制項中的第三個文字方塊是`LocationInfoGroup`驗證群組。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 當`Button1`按一下時，驗證群組中的控制項`PersonalInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `Button1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 當`Button2`按一下時，驗證群組中的控制項`LocationInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `Button2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/CS/button.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/VB/button.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
